page.title: 19TRANSPORT IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: Rossendale transport operates a fleet of 47 comprising of double deckers and single decker buses.Many of the bus services are operated jointly with Ribble Motor Services.We get buses from Burnley,Manchester and Bury. Rossendale transport carrys 5.2 million passengers annually.People are able to buy Rovers Tickets from newsagents.This enables people to travel as often as they like.Seating capacity ranges from 28 to 75.For one stop it is 4p for children and 8p for adults. A survey of people found 16% owned no cars,50% own one,29% own two and 5% own three or more.Rawtenstall attracts traffic from Burnley,M'chester and local towns.Traffic Survey(12 June 85) :into R'stall-cars 324 p/hr,goods 141 p/hr.Out of R'stall cars 288 p/hr, goods 156 p/hr.
